fields.name: value
fields.desc: The value represented by this radio button.

fields.name: groupValue
fields.desc: The currently selected value for a group of radio buttons.

fields.name: onChanged
fields.desc: Called when the user selects this radio button.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.radio.mouseCursor} The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the widget.

fields.name: toggleable
fields.desc: Set to true if this radio button is allowed to be returned to an indeterminate state by selecting it again when selected.

fields.name: activeColor
fields.desc: The color to use when this radio button is selected.

fields.name: fillColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.radio.fillColor} The color that fills the radio button, in all [WidgetState]s.

fields.name: materialTapTargetSize
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.radio.materialTapTargetSize} Configures the minimum size of the tap target. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: visualDensity
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.radio.visualDensity} Defines how compact the radio's layout will be. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: focusColor
fields.desc: The color for the radio's [Material] when it has the input focus.

fields.name: hoverColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.radio.hoverColor} The color for the radio's [Material] when a pointer is hovering over it.

fields.name: overlayColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.radio.overlayColor} The color for the radio's [Material].

fields.name: splashRadius
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.radio.splashRadius} The splash radius of the circular [Material] ink response. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: useCupertinoCheckmarkStyle
fields.desc: Controls whether the checkmark style is used in an iOS-style radio.
